Table of Contents

Name


portals -- Cplant portals startup script

Synopsis


portals start|stop|restart [ethernet]

Description

portals is the script in the init.d/ directory which is used to start or stop cplant portals on a node. Without the ethernet argument, it loads cplant's custom MCP and all cplant kernel modules. It ethernet is given as an argument, the script will not attempt to load the custom cplant mcp, and the rtscts-eth.mod kernel module will be loaded (instead of rtscts.mod).

See Also


cfg, cplant, Guide to building and installing Cplant
